WRITING.TITLE: Bill Nye is better than being represented
WRITING.TEXT: There's been a weird amount of posts reaching the front page about this show. And don't get me wrong it's not the greatest thing ever, but it's fine and it's important to have programming like this. The post I see knocking the show are because they personally feel attacked. Guess what!? your fad diet is bullshit you fucking moron. Honestly we should be encouraging this kind of program because we have nothing but a shovel of bullshit being forced down our throats.

Rittenhouse hands down for the manhattans. I used Bulleit for a long time and when I tried Rittenhouse, the difference was huge. You can drink bulleit neat if you like, there's nothing too jarring about it and it is quite pleasant after 2 sips. Rittenhouse, though, no. Unless you like a kick in the teeth. More important than the whiskey is the vermouth for manhattans. You'll want to splurge a little bit on the vermouth especially your dry vermouth if you use it in your manhattan. You should also be using luxardo cherries and not regular candied cherries.
Read that interaction in the respective voices. Thanks for that break up of monotony to my day friend.
Tea and soda water are your friend.
Just eat what you're supposed to. If you eat 1500-2000 empty calories, then no you will not be doing it correctly. In a lot of cases it's as simple as cutting sugars down to a normal level.

That's very nice and all but you are confusing strength for health. If you had said 5 miles a day I'd be like oh he is getting aerobic excersize as well and not just chugging protein and compressing his spine and joints. I'm not you dude, I don't care what you do, but you're in a tiny bit of denial.
I'm 5 10 and 190 and I am definitely past healthy weight. I have some bad news for you friend....

The daily show almost always uses actors and heavy editing. They have never tried to hide this but they haven't gone out of their way to show this. People have mentioned the irony of getting smug self satisfaction from watching people they think are idiots while it's them who are in fact the idiots. I'm not saying these people don't exist, but I would take this time for some self reflection of whether or not you are any better than these "gullible uninformed people"

WRITING.TITLE: Wolverine is definitely not circumcised
WRITING.TEXT: This made my eyes pop open at around 1 am this morning.

Check the comments, it's all rabid cavemen. It's all the shit birds using the anonymity of a computer to talk shit. That doesn't bother me and the site doesn't bother me, I served ten years and that stuff is par for the course. What bothers me is one guy had the guts to make an unpopular comment (granted, it was cringe worthy) and everyone has found comfort in numbers to shit all over this guy. Show some nuts and condemn the shit bags taking out their impotent rage on him. It doesn't mean you agree with him, it will just show you don't condone pussy internet warrior bullshit.

WRITING.TITLE: Too hard to satirize? Why not do the opposite then?
WRITING.TEXT:
Seriously. Why not just do an alternate reality where Trump is just the best fucking President we ever had. And just have him constantly first-person narrating why he is/isn't doing something and why it is phenomenal/disastrous. Like keep his same demeanor but have him go " Of course I'm not going to do a half assed muslim ban that accomplishes nothing and only incites our enemies" And then hire on a couple political scientists to help with what he would do to make a utilitarian decision. And make it aware of itself but not so wink wink nudge nudge (sorry I don't know literary lingo). And even end it with it being a happy ending and just let it sit like that. Just one giant juxtaposition without having the rug pulled out at the end.
edit: typos and such

Which third party candidate? There is boat load of people running for president. If you mean whichever candidate the most confused protest votes have turned to then that's some pretty shitty reasoning. You either have Ayn Rand's dream come true party or the legion of suburban housebodies getting covered. In depth media coverage would only hurt these parties more.
You listed a bunch of sections of business that you clearly hold in disdain. However you support a candidate that these same entities would love to have in office.

The U.S. Libertarian Party political platform (2012) states: "Recognizing that abortion is a sensitive issue and that people can hold good-faith views on all sides, we believe that government should be kept out of the matter, leaving the question to each person for their conscientious consideration."
You either provide funding or you don't. You can't have a dogmatic stance of "no government interference" One way or another your will have the big bad boogeyman government making it their business. Also libertarians, in general, are pretty split on abortion. The party has only existed since the 70s has had little to no influence except to get "big government" off the case of innocent billionaires trying to dump chicken shit wherever they please. So it's difficult to say how much of their platform actually aligns with the views of would be voters.
Ha, I wasn't aware we had four major candidates. I get your point though.

Yes, polar was a bit of hyperbole. I'm not going to argue on the two parties in relation the two major parties. To generalize them both, however, you could say that libertarians (depends who you ask because most libertarians don't seem to understand where their party aligns)seek to reduce government where possible and the green party seek to strengthen it. Now this is not a completely true statement, but it is true enough to make the point the ventura doesn't know what the fuck he is talking about.
So you'd vote for two polar opposite candidates. Two candidates that could not be more different, but you want to sound different and vote for the less obvious choice.

Why do you trump up your service whenever given the opportunity? On your wikipedia page you have your rank listed as Special Warfare Operator 3rd Class. You were the lowest petty officer rank and this NOT a common practice to list your job as your rank unless there is shorthand where you are stationed. Your career can summed up by your two ribbons that only prove that you graduated boot camp during war time. It's not a big deal that you didn't have some glamorous career. For example, I was in the Marine Corps 10 years, where I was primarily a laser technician and I did a stint as an embassy guard. Now I could easily make that sound way fancier than it is, but I don't. Now I don't know you, but I've known many like you and they are all shitbags. Prone to constantly lieing and bragging to cover up insecurities. That is your life, and when someone calls you out on it you lash out of with roid driven angst.
I really wish the media and politics wasn't polluted with people like you that can't simply go fade into the background, but instead have to constantly insert yourself in the limelight to get one more fix of validation.
It could be argued that people like you are the reason the Stolen Valor act exists and if there any justice, you would be charged with it.

I'm not certain this is the end all explanation for his "beliefs". A coupe things to consider: it is possible that a lot of his work was stolen and then he used his powerful religious position to stamp out their existence in history, he was by most accounts he was crazy af, and it was also possible he was using his late in life position to disprove a lot of things about religion.
Whatever the case is, when it comes to Newton all we have is an extremely sanitized version of the events.

What about politics did you study. Surely someone with a background in engineering can appreciate how broad of a topic that is. That's like saying you studied science or math. You might even start by saying what type of engineer you are. You aren't old enough for the generic "engineer" so I'm assuming you had a discipline.
You have to understand that although we "younger folk" are insufferable and disrespectful, we can also smell a giant pile of bullshit from a mile away. We didn't grow up in a time where you could make sweeping generalizations and everyone goes "hey that sounds like a swell idea".
For fucks sake, you are supposedly an engineer which would boast a fine attention to detail, so show some attention to detail in your approach.

I just straight up don't like her, she makes me want to change my preset radio station. Let me clarify that I support Clinton and will be voting for her.
